raw_body: KADURUWANE – CUDA – At Rest with Jesus. Beloved son of Nanda and Sharmina and precious grandson of Tendry and Princess,​ loving partner of Sue. Cuda’s remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 9.00 a.m. Wednesday,​ 26th July. Funeral Service at 4.30 p.m. followed by Cremation at 5.30 p.m. at the New Crematorium Borella Kanatte.045944
